verses.verse: This <S%H2088><s%> is the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H121>Adam<s%>. In the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H120>man<s%>, in the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> made he <S%H6213>him<s%>;

male <S%H2145><s%> and <S%H5347>female<s%> <S%H1254>created<s%> he <S%H1288>them<s%>, and blessed <S%H7121>them<s%>, and called their <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H120>Adam<s%>, in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when they were <S%H1254>created<s%>.

And <S%H121>Adam<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, and <S%H3205>begat<s%> a son in his own <S%H1823>likeness<s%>, after his <S%H6754>image<s%>; and <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8352>Seth<s%>:

and the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H121>Adam<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H8352>Seth<s%> were <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>: and he <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters<s%>.
And all the <S%H3117>days<s%> that <S%H121>Adam<s%> <S%H2425>lived<s%> were <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>: and he <S%H4191>died<s%>.
and all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H8352>Seth<s%> were <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6240>twelve<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>: and he <S%H4191>died<s%>.
and all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H583>Enosh<s%> were <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>: and he <S%H4191>died<s%>.
and all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7018>Kenan<s%> were <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>: and he <S%H4191>died<s%>.
and all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H4111>Mahalalel<s%> were <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8673>ninety<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>: and he <S%H4191>died<s%>.
And all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3382>Jared<s%> were <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8346>sixty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>: and he <S%H4191>died<s%>.
and all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H2585>Enoch<s%> were <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8346>sixty<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>:
and <S%H2585>Enoch<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> with <S%H430>God<s%>: and he was <S%H430>not<s%>; for God took <S%H3947>him<s%>.
And all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H4968>Methuselah<s%> were <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8346>sixty<s%> and <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>: and he <S%H4191>died<s%>.

and he <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5146>Noah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, This same shall <S%H5162>comfort<s%> us in our <S%H4639>work<s%> and in the <S%H6093>toil<s%> of our <S%H3027>hands<s%>, which cometh <S%H4480>because<s%> of the <S%H127>ground<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H779>cursed<s%>.
And all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3929>Lamech<s%> were <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>: and he <S%H4191>died<s%>.
